tool_description: An API showing all the latest climate change news related to food production
name: Food production affects climate
title: Food production affects climate

api_list.name: Get Individual News Sources
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://food-production-affects-climate.p.rapidapi.com/news/EPA"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "food-production-affects-climate.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://food-production-affects-climate.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "food-production-affects-climate.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all client related to food production news
